name: Barghest
description:
Aid the Holy Knight on fulfilling it's sacred duty, releasing the evil spirits of their eternal torment.

May their own soul be saved too.

As the ghost onslaught continues the hordes will be ever more aggressive, how many can you liberate before you fall? 

    

Wondo - Development

RafaAGM - Music (Check out his Spotify!)

Fonts by Eeve Somepx (check out his Humble Fonts!)

Feedback is very appreciated!! and share your highscore!
